name: Tile Tesselator
description:
Enjoy a Bouncy Puzzle game where you paint the Tiles you land on and score points in the process! Watch out though, because for every four seconds you take to reach the Goal you will lose a point when proceeding to the next level. Most importantly however, Enjoy our game! I know we will be enjoying yours!

CREDITS:

PROGRAMMER/ARTIST: Bryce Johnson

COMPOSER: Sheldon Cooper

MAP EDITOR: "Taint"
